titleStmt.title: The [co]ntinuation [of] the forraine avisoes for two weekes last past, containing many very remarkable passages of Germanie, France, Spaine, Italy, Sweden, the Low-Countries, and other parts of the world ...

publicationStmt.publisher: For N. Butter...] at St. Austins gate.,

notesStmt.note: Error in paging: p. nos. 481-482 skipped in numbering.

Imperfect: torn, tightly bound, with print bleeding and show-through, with loss of text; pp. 471-472 lacking. Bracketed material in title and imprint conjectured from other issues, and from STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
